Kalapuraparambil Automobiles is one of India's most trusted vehicle customization and modification experts with 28+ years of experience. We build custom caravans, luxury vehicles, special-purpose vehicles, and more. We've delivered over 5500 vehicles!

We're Kerala's premier caravan builders and vehicle modification specialists. From luxury Force Urbania conversions to custom caravans, mobile ICUs, campaign vehicles, and cash vans ‚Äì we turn ordinary vehicles into extraordinary experiences.

With 28 years in business and 5500+ vehicles delivered, we specialize in custom caravan builds, Force Traveller modifications, Force Urbania conversions, luxury interiors, and special-purpose vehicles. We build more than vehicles ‚Äì we build experiences!

patterns: What kind of work do you do
responses: We offer: 1) Force Traveller Modification 2) Custom Caravan Design & Build 3) Force Urbania Modification 4) Special-Purpose Vehicles (Mobile ICU, Cash Vans, Campaign Vehicles, Mobile ATMs) 5) Luxury Interiors & Installations 6) Vehicle Remodeling, Repair & Painting

Our main services include custom caravan building, Force Traveller and Urbania modifications, luxury interior installations, special-purpose vehicle builds (ambulances, cash vans, campaign vehicles), and complete vehicle remodeling and painting.

We provide end-to-end vehicle customization: Custom caravans, Force Traveller/Urbania luxury conversions, A/C fitting, entertainment systems, massage chairs, wood & fiber works, digital painting, and special-purpose vehicle builds.

We design and build fully customized caravans from the ground up ‚Äì your layout, your style, your comfort. Perfect for families, travelers, and anyone who wants their vehicle to be a true home on wheels. We can convert vehicles like Tata Winger, Force Traveller into luxury caravans.

Our custom caravans are built with premium materials and include luxury interiors, sleeping areas, kitchen facilities, bathrooms, entertainment systems, A/C, and more. Each caravan is designed specifically for your needs and lifestyle.

We're caravan specialists with 28+ years of experience. We create mobile homes on wheels with custom layouts, luxury amenities, and attention to every detail ‚Äì from seating comfort to climate control and entertainment.

We transform Force Travellers into premium luxury vehicles! Whether it's a family caravan, tourist vehicle, or campaign ride, we provide custom interiors, better seating, advanced entertainment systems, A/C, and complete interior makeovers.

Our Force Traveller modifications include: luxury seating, entertainment systems, A/C installation, custom wood/fiber interiors, LED lighting, flooring, curtaining, and complete exterior painting. Turn your plain Traveller into a head-turner!

Force Traveller modification is one of our specialties. We can convert it into a luxury tourist vehicle, family caravan, campaign vehicle, or any custom design you envision. All work done in-house with premium quality.

We specialize in Force Urbania modifications! We transform your Urbania into a stylish, comfortable luxury ride with custom interiors, premium seating, entertainment systems, massage chairs, A/C, and complete design solutions.

Our Force Urbania conversions include luxury interiors, reclining massage seats, entertainment systems, ambient lighting, wood/fiber works, flooring, and complete exterior painting. We've done projects for clients across Kerala, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Telangana, and Andhra Pradesh.

Force Urbania modification is our expertise. We provide complete design and customization ‚Äì luxury seating, entertainment, A/C, custom interiors, and premium finishes that make your Urbania stand out on the road.

We build various special-purpose vehicles: Mobile ICUs, Ambulances, RBI-compliant Cash Vans, Mobile ATMs, Election Campaign Vehicles, Public Awareness Vehicles, Mobile Supermarkets, and Food Trucks. All built to exact specifications and compliance requirements.

Our special-purpose vehicle builds are trusted by hospitals, banks, political parties, NGOs, government bodies, and retailers. We ensure security, functionality, and compliance in every build ‚Äì from mobile medical units to cash transport vehicles.

Need a specialized vehicle? We've built mobile homes, cash vans, mobile ATMs, mobile ICUs, campaign vehicles, and advertising vehicles for clients across India. Fully customized, secure, and compliant with all regulations.

Our luxury interior services include: Custom wood & fiber works, digital painting, A/C fitting and maintenance, LED & ambient lighting, premium flooring, curtaining, massage chair installation, sliding doors, and entertainment systems. All designed to match your vision!

We obsess over every detail ‚Äì seating comfort, lighting, climate control, entertainment, and finish. Our luxury interiors feature premium materials, custom woodwork, advanced A/C systems, entertainment setups, and beautiful aesthetics.

Transform your vehicle's interior with our luxury installation services: Reclining massage seats, entertainment systems, custom wood panels, fiber works, LED mood lighting, A/C systems, premium flooring, and elegant curtaining.

Yes! We provide vehicle remodeling, accident repair, and premium paint jobs. Our team restores and upgrades all kinds of vehicles ‚Äì cars, trucks, commercial vans, and more. We'll bring your vehicle back to perfection!

We handle complete vehicle remodeling, body repairs, dent fixes, accident restoration, and professional painting services. All work is done with precision and quality materials to restore your vehicle to its best condition.
From minor dent repairs to major accident restoration and complete paint jobs ‚Äì we do it all. Our painting and remodeling services cover cars, trucks, commercial vehicles, and custom builds.
